projects.title: 2D/3D Hybrid Puzzle Adventure
projects.description: A puzzle adventure game combining 2D and 3D gameplay with narrative-driven progression.
projects.detailedDescription: A hybrid puzzle adventure built with Unreal Engine, where 2D and 3D mechanics coexist within a single game flow.
features: Puzzle mechanics integrated with story progression

projects.title: Gyro-Integrated Detective Game
projects.description: A detective game that uses smartphone gyroscope input for investigation.
projects.detailedDescription: A detective game utilizing gyroscope sensor data to control camera perspective. Players physically move their device to investigate environments and search for clues, increasing immersion.

projects.title: Simulation Novel (Danganronpa-style)
projects.description: A story-driven simulation novel inspired by Danganronpa.
projects.detailedDescription: A narrative-focused simulation novel inspired by Danganronpa, featuring branching storylines and an evolving character emotion system. The project focuses on narrative structure and event-driven systems.
features: Branching narrative based on player choices

projects.title: Keyboard-Controlled 2D Side-Scroller Game
projects.description: A 2D side scroller game controlled entirely through keyboard text input.
projects.detailedDescription: A minimalist 2D side scroller where all player actions are executed through a single keyboard input field. The input-focused interface remains active throughout the entire game experience.

projects.title: VR Public Speaking Simulation
projects.description: A VR simulation designed to help users practice public speaking.
projects.detailedDescription: A VR-based public speaking simulation that recreates realistic presentation environments. NPCs actively interact with the player, requiring simultaneous presentation and audience awareness.
